description: Amendments to planning permission dated 15th January 2019 (RN 17/05283/FULL) for the Demolition of Nos 66 & 68 Oxford Street and redevelopment behind retained facades of Nos 54-62 Oxford Street and 51-58 Rathbone Place to provide a new building comprising four basement levels, ground and seven upper floor levels.  Use of entire building either for retail (Class A1) or the use of part basements to first floor as retail (Class A1) and offices (Class B1) with a dual/alternative use of floors two to seven for either retail (Class A1) or office (Class B1) use; and associated works including plant at basement levels 3 and 4, the creation of terraces at sixth and seventh floors; external roof top plant at seventh floor level behind an acoustic attenuated louvred fa√ßade onto Perrys Place, and the installation of photovoltaic panels at roof level. NAMELY, to introduce a series of minor alterations to the consented elevations and internal layouts, and to change the use of Level 1 from retail to office. And to amend the wording of Conditions 4, 6, 11, 18 and 24  to alter the trigger dates.
site_name: Proposed Development Site At 51 To 58 Rathbone Place And 54-62 And 66 And 68
